survey_name: Urban Bike Share Program User Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of the city's bike share program to evaluate satisfaction levels, identify pain points, and improve service quality.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the city's bike share program?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the city's bike share program?

questions.question_text: What are your primary reasons for using the bike share program? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with open text if needed.

script.question_text: What are your primary reasons for using the bike share program? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bikes at your usual stations?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except 'First-time user' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of bikes at your usual stations?
script.routing_logic: All respondents except 'First-time user' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the bike share program?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the bike share program?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the bike share program to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard NPS-like scale. Ensure clear labeling of endpoints.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the bike share program to others?
